item.title: Peabody Pulls Out of $3.8 Billion Deal for Anglo Coal Assets
item.description: Anglo American Plc suffered a major setback to its restructuring plans after Peabody Energy Corp. decided to walk away from a $3.8 billion deal to buy its steelmaking coal business following a fire at
